body:
If a study has already been disabled before the extension was marked unusable, you should not be able to relaunch it until you change the extension to a usable one.

I'm not sure how to handle if the add-on is marked unusable while the study is still live. My instincts tell me we should disable the recipe, but there might be weird edge cases.

For the url question, I have no strong opinions. People may want to test old experiments on older builds to recreate something that happened during that time period? Maybe?
